Class MessageCenter

class MessageCenter

Method Detail

deliverMessage

public static bool deliverMessage( Message* msg );
delivers a message testing against any stored filters
Parameters:
msg - - the message to be delivered
Returns:
- true if the Message was delivered

drainLink

protected static void drainLink( Link* link );

registerFilter

public static HMessageFilter registerFilter( MessageTester* mt, Delegate* d );
adds a filter to the MessageCenter. This filter will be tested for each and every Message that comes through.
Parameters:
mt - - a pointer to a tester
d - - a pointer to the delegate to call if a Message passes the test
Returns:
- the Handle to the filter (can be used later to remove the filter)

registerLink

public static void registerLink( Link* link );
adds a link for the MessageCenter to Manage. Managed Links are read periodically and thier Messages are sent via any registered filters
Parameters:
link - - the Link pointer to register
id - - an id number assigned to the link

registerObserver

public static void registerObserver( MessageObserver* observer );
adds an observer to the current list of observers
Parameters:
observer - - the observer to add.

tick

public static void tick();
causes any registered Links to be read and thier messages delivered

unregisterFilter

public static void unregisterFilter( HMessageFilter handle );
removes a filter from the MessageCenter
Parameters:
handle - - the handle to the filter to be removed

unregisterLink

public static void unregisterLink( Link* link );
unregisters a Link. Once unregistered, the MessageCenter will not process it any longer
Parameters:
link - - the Link pointer to unregister

unregisterObserver

public static void unregisterObserver( MessageObserver* observer );
